metadata.title: CVE-2020-8955 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
irc_mode_channel_update in plugins/irc/irc-mode.c in WeeChat through 2.7allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via amalformed IRC message 324 (channel mode).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8955` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

weechat - 1.4-2ubuntu0.1+esm1
weechat-core - 1.4-2ubuntu0.1+esm1
weechat-curses - 1.4-2ubuntu0.1+esm1
weechat-plugins - 1.4-2ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: weechat package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4-2ubuntu0.1+esm1').
